reference.title: apiDesc
reference.shortdesc: The <apiDesc> element describes the API item in detail, and expands on the short description about that API item.

section.title: Description
section.p: For example, in the Java API reference, the <apiDesc> element represents the class, interface, field, method, and parameter description.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following examples illustrate types of <apiDesc> elements for different API class items:
example.codeblock: <javaFieldDetail> <apiDesc>This constant is returned if the connection is open.</apiDesc> </javaFieldDetail>
<javaParamDetail> <apiDesc>Be sure to provide a test parameter that matches the defined properties.</apiDesc> </javaParamDetail>
<javaMethodDetail> <apiDesc>Specifies the format and size of the serialized content.</apiDesc> </javaMethodDetail>
